title: Repealed
context: ยง237-16 REPEALED. L 2003, c 135, ยง11. Cross References Qualified improvement tax credit, see chapter 235D. Attorney General Opinions Legislation prohibiting visible pass-on tax from seller to buyer might deprive buyer of right to sales tax deduction on federal income tax return. Att. Gen. Op. 65-13. Case Notes Automobile leasing agreements constitute conditional sales, when. 53 H. 195, 490 P.2d 902. Sales of paint to one in automobile painting business, who consumes paint, are retail sales. 53 H. 450, 497 P.2d 37. Cited: 56 H. 644, 547 P.2d 1343.
